text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ――Haaa, haaa, haa……!! Aww man, I ran out of energy part way again……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Even though I've been doing so much stamina training…… no, this isn't the time to be complaining! The 『Oaks』 is soon so I need to work hard……!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hey. ……You already realized it, right? About Kraft-san.
(I already knew. The longer the distance, the harder it would be for Kraft. The 『Oaks』, at 2400m……would be very difficult)
(Based on that, I believed the best option for Kraft…… would be to offer her another option……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……I really admire them. My senpais on the Triple Tiara route.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: And that's why I'm choosing the Triple Tiara rotation. And, I'll become strong enough that I won't lose against Triple Crown Uma Musume!
(Admiration can be the driving force behind chasing your dream. Without that, it would be like taking away your entire reason for running)
(Considering how much Kraft admired the Tiara……it might be too much to ask her to give up on the 『Oaks』――)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: As you continue to run, sometimes the shape of your dreams will change……or perhaps there's no choice other than for it to change.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: However, they never disappear. If you never give up, never let go――that's for certain.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Aren't you the one that understands that the most? ……since you've been walking this path with me this whole time.
Right……think. Don't just dismiss it out of hand, keep thinking it through. What can I do for Kraft right now……?
Right……think. Don't just dismiss it out of hand, keep thinking it through. What can I do for Kraft right now……?
(Kraft is……a girl that admires the Tiara Uma Musume more than anything. Then, who would know best what to say to Kraft right now――)

text_block_list.name: Telecaster
text_block_list.text: 『"The Unparalleled Queens"――Tonight, we'll be speaking about the magnificent tales of the top Senior Class Queen Uma Musume』
Several Queen Uma Musume who had etched their names in to history were shown on screen.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ――It could be said that it was 『Overturning』 expectations. The revival of a dynasty by my Grandmother, and my mother who won two tiaras. As one descended from their blood――

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: As the successor to a "Renowned Family" who had many expectations to achieve the Triple Tiara. That I was unable to accomplish it is reality.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Being unable to participate in the 『Oka Sho』, and a late start during the 『Oaks』. Being forced to recuperate during the autumn.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……On top of that, my aptitude lying in short distances.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: As you're aware, compared to the royal road that is medium distances, there is much less attention. There were a great number of voices of disappointment when switching. However――

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: What I recieved from my mother and my grandmother, was this 『Speed』. In that world where we compete for those instants, short distance, I ran to prove myself.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: That this path――is my duty, that this place is where my passion can shine.
Daiichi Ruby. Winning the 『Yasuda Kinen』 and 『Sprinter's S』, an Uma Musume that proved the strength of her bloodline through her 『Speed』.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: ――I don't believe I possess any outstanding qualities or talent. Unlike everyone else here, I never achieved victory in a G1.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: However, if it's something that I take pride in, then I do have that. My strength was achieved through the information gained from those around me.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: My 『Intel Skills』 are what I take pride in, my weapon. In the racing world, filled with such strong individuals, to truly shine――this is my weapon.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: To go just a bit farther. For one more battle. And――to obtain just one more bit of glory.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: With this weapon, my 『Intel Skills』, I will accomplish that. ……I am proud to do this on my own will.
Ikuno Dictus. In the Twinkle Series, competing in 51 races without injury――
With a grueling 3-week rotation of the 『Yasuda Kinen』 and 『Takarazuka Kinen』. An Uma Musume with a body and mind of steel who still managed to achieve 2nd place in both.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: ――Getting a flashy title like 『Unparalleled Queen』, huh? Honestly, I never thought of anything complicated like that!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: The only thing I seek is to compete against the strong! That's all!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: A lukewarm battle, does nothing to fire up my soul. For this body, for this heart, it can't be anything but a fierce race!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Something that pushes me closer and closer to my limits――no, a race that forces me past my limits, that's when I become the strongest.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Sometimes I'd get asked if I've ever felt intimidated, you know? But never, not once. Rather, it's so fun I can't help but get excited!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: It was like that when I faced off against that "Monster" too! I'm the strongest when I'm fighting it out!!
Hishi Amazon. Although she wasn't able to participate in the Oka Sho or Oaks, she had won 5 consecutive major victories. Then she went on to win the Elizabeth Cup――
Not only was she considered the queen of her generation, but with her strength, she was the only one to come even close to that "Monster", Narita Brian, at the 『Arima Kinen』.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ――My mother once held the title of "Queen". From my first steps…… or maybe even before that, my path was already decided.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: To become the brightest guiding light. To become the 『Ideal』 for all Uma Musume, for all those who are just beginning.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That is my mission. To become that "Empress" is my reason for existence.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: In which case, I have nothing to fear. No matter which battlefield―― whether it be the 『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』 or the 『Japan Cup』.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I will move forth with dignity, putting all of my strength, all of my being, in to obtaining victory.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: To continue taking on all those challenges will be the way to inspire all those that come after――I think that belief is what spurred me on to greater heights.
Air Groove. She became the first Uma Musume from the Tiara route to win the 『Tenno Sho (Autumn)』, becoming an inspiration for many famous Uma Musume after her.
Staring at the screen, I racked my brain. Keep thinking. These amazing Uma Musume who carved their names in to history, what did they all have in common?
Each of them had their own dreams, goals, and missions, alongside a strong desire to pursue them.
Wondering where they could shine the brightest. Understanding their true strengths.
Thinking, worrying, choosing. And then――
(……deciding their own unique path for themselves. Something they could be proud of and achieving glory along the way)
Just like the Triple Crown Uma Musume, they built an era. Leaving a wide impact on many, even if they weren't considered the representatives of their generation.
But those Tiara Uma Musume still had an appeal all of their own. And――they had already shown us that. They had shown us and created that link.
(That's why……Rhein Kraft was here right now, why she was running.)
The program had ended before I realized. I turned off the TV and took a deep breath. The room was completely silent, the only thing on my mind――was the cheering at the 『Oka Sho』.
I was now convinced. The place that Rhein Kraft could be the strongest, shine the brightest was――
(Knock knock……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Excuse me……Ah, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Good afternoon. Um, well then……by important conversation, what did you mean?
I tried not to sound too cold, but wanted to give my honest opinion. Due to her aptitudes, the 2400m Oaks would probably be incredibly difficult.
Therefore, as a trainer――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh……eh? By different, you mean……?
……your run at the 『Oka Sho』 was really amazing. When it comes to Mile races, I think you're the fastest of your generation……that's what I believe.
……your run at the 『Oka Sho』 was really amazing. When it comes to Mile races, I think you're the fastest of your generation……that's what I believe.
That's why……Kraft.
Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.
Just give it some thought Kraft. And about your aspirations, your dreams, and what you've seen so far along your journey.
And then…… about a path that only you can run.
And then…… about a path that only you can run.
